channel.title: Tom's Cache Editor won't work?
channel.description: Hello, so I just downloaded Tom's cache editor, tried multiple download links, but they all don't seem to work for me, I start it up, load my cache, then go to View/Edit Image Archives, then a window pops up asks me for Title, Media or Texture, I select Media, then press ok and nothing happens, the current window doesn't close, and also nothing new is opend up.. Any idea's? Or should I try diff cache/PC?

item.title: Tom's Cache Editor won't work?
item.dc:creator: @tchandle tchandle
item.description:
@tchandle wrote:

Yeah, first what love said in client folder, click cache folder and then open.

But one thing I always do, or I always get errors, is I always copy my cache files(dat,idk) to a new folder on my desktop and then I open it with the cache editor. Edit, and then I copy and replace back into client.

Read full topic
